meanings.definition: The quality or state of being an expert.
meanings.sent1: Her expertnesses in painting were evident in every brushstroke.
meanings.sent2: His expertnesses in coding made him the go-to person for tech issues.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed expertnesses in catching mice, much to the surprise of the family.
meanings.sent4: Her expertnesses in gardening bloomed like a beautiful flower in the community.
meanings.sent5: The expertnesses of the chef shone through in the exquisite flavors of the dish.

meanings.definition: The skill or knowledge possessed by an expert.
meanings.sent1: The team relied on his expertnesses to solve the complex problem.
meanings.sent2: She demonstrated her expertnesses in negotiation during the business deal.
meanings.sent3: The robot's expertnesses in cleaning led to a spotless house every day.
meanings.sent4: His expertnesses in music were like a symphony to the ears of the audience.
meanings.sent5: The expertnesses of the detective were unmatched in solving mysteries.
